changesetID.description: The 40 char hex ID of the changeset. See https://www.mercurial-scm.org/wiki/ChangeSetID

reviewSystemUsed.description: Which code review system was used to review this changeset?

repository.description: The URL of the repository the changeset was pushed to

pushDate.description: Integer UNIX timestamp of when the push to the repository occurred, as recorded by the repository pushlog
